name: Gun knight (CapBear, RyanCuaGames)
description:
Say what if a knight were given a gun? What would he do with it?
Perhaps he would shoot it? But can a knight even use a gun properly?
Find out here in Gun Knight a short adventure game about a knight journey
for his king as his explore the mysterious artifact "GUN". 

Made as a part of GodotWildJam #35 #godotwildjam
